scripts.say: Attention, members of Special Task Force One. Though we may have suffered a setback and lost communication with headquarters...
The attack from the unidentified superweapon has parted the fog of war, the biggest uncertainty factor in our operation so far. Make use of this opportunity and attack!
From here, we shall continue "Operation Tungsten!"
Mobilise all usable carrier-based aircraft, and prepare to launch in 20 minutes time!
